caption:
Finally had time to make the matching @danielhowell to my @amazingphil and I love them so much <3 I made them in merch so we could match, cause I pretty much only wear DnP merch right now ^^;

Now a small DnP positive rant (What is a positive rant called?)

TW: Depression

I keep them on a shelf across from my bed so I can wave at them every morning and wish them goodnight because in a lot of ways they are the reason I wake up. I was extremely depressed a few years ago and the only thing that kept me going was the desire to see the amazing people these two boys would become. I knew they would do great things, but I could never have imagined the extent of what they’d accomplish. I am so proud of them and so thankful for them <3

Also, I have pretty intense agoraphobia that I deal with on an almost daily bases and I have tried almost everything to fix it, or at least find something that helps me cope. I never would have guessed that it would be the merch of two nerds I’ve never met that would make such a huge difference. I feel safe and supported when I’m in a big DnP hoodie, like someone is there for me. It’s a weird feeling, but it’s nice.

With the help of these boys I am now planning to attend university in the fall after putting it off for a couple years.

Honestly owe a lot to these beautiful (inside and out) lads <3

title: Party (3) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two

And It’s Good Enough To Make Me Wanna Fall In Love - phanlight

Summary: “my friend dragged me to this party and I just saw my ex quick make out with me” au.

A Price to Pay - placingglaciers

Summary: In which Phil has a massive cliché crush on his writing tutor, the most popular guy at college, and gets invited to one of his legendary parties. One requirement though: Phil needs a plus one.

A Vodka Kind of Love - flowers-and-colored-hair

Summary: Dan wears varsity jackets and Phil wears leather jackets. The two would never be caught together, but all thanks to a party, Dan’s godawful phone service, and an argument over who would top, they become friends. With benefits. Minus the friends part.

Before The Ride (ao3) larry_hystereks

Summary: The story where pastel dan meets footballer phil at a party and they can’t quite seem to keep their hands off each other.

Crushing On The Bad Boy - pasteldanhowells

Summary: In which Louise tries to help her best friend out by setting him up with his biggest crush, Phil Lester, the bad boy Quarterback on the football team. They’re total opposites, but Louise thinks Dan has a chance with him. However, things don’t exactly go to plan.

drunk words are sober thoughts - danhasacrushonphil

Summary:  The opportunity of a life time comes in the form of Phil Lester actually showing up at a party, all tattoos and bright blue eyes. Dan’s been crushing on him for far too long, so getting the chance to play Never Have I Ever with his crush? Yeah, he can’t pass that one up. What could go wrong?

I’ll Hold Your Flower Crown (ao3) - kitchen_sinks

Summary: Small pastel!Dan gets drunk at a party and throws up all over punk!Phil and his leather jacket.

Irresistible - helloanonymouswriter

Summary: Phil sees his ex boyfriend, Dan, at a party and stuff happens.

No One Has To Know - phan-panda

Summary: A house party takes an interesting turn for Dan and Phil when they are dared by a rather rude party-goer to play a game of 7 minutes in heaven together.

Panic - jilliancares

Summary: Dan has a panic attack at a party but Phil’s there to help.

Small and Vulnerable - philsdrill

Summary: Dan and Phil have been at a Youtube party in London and Dan had a little too much to drink.

Some Things Are Meant To Be (ao3) - scifi

Summary: Dan thinks his work halloween party is the worst thing in the world until a co-worker he has never met before grabs his attention.

The Boy Who Blocked His Own Shot - auroraphilealis

Summary: Dan has never been a fan of frat houses, and after Phil comes onto him at a frat party and then pushes him into a pool, Dan can’t help feeling vindicated. Phil, on the other hand, just wants to apologize.

The Strong, The Weak, And The Courageous - placingglaciers

Summary: In which Dan and Phil have a sort of “friends with benefits” relationship and they go to a lame dance followed by a lame party that has a lame spin-the-bottle game that potentially changes their relationship “forever.”

To Believe In Ghosts - elliesfics

Summary: Dan is not the partying type. So when he is dragged against his will to a friend’s Halloween bash, it really is no surprise that things quickly go astray. But Halloween night is only just the beginning. Sometimes it takes an entire lifetime to learn a lesson…sometimes even a death.

Too Hot - jilliancares

Summary: Dan gets dragged to a party he doesn’t want to go to and then dragged into playing a game he doesn’t want to play. He can only hope that he won’t end up having to kiss Phil Lester, who he hates more than slow internet.

Too Pure to Party - elliesfics

Summary: When Dan agrees to join his friend at a University Frat party, he didn’t expect to lose his friend so early on. And now, lost in the crowds of drunken partygoers, a far too innocent Dan is in for more than he bargained for… Unless a certain someone saves him first.

Until My Pity Party’s In Flames (ao3) - philsbasket

Summary: High school AU in which Dan and Phil are both at a party and end up hiding out in the same bathroom.

What Defines A Good Person (ao3) - crazed_peanut

Summary: Dan and Phil are university students and meet at a party. Dan has a boyfriend, but him and Phil still let things happen between them.

With The Tide (ao3) - Cougar88

Summary: Dan and Phil go to a beach party at night. Things accidentally happen…
